basic.name: Penetrating Round (Q)
basic.description: Deal 205 damage, knock back, and Slow enemies in a line by 20% for 2 seconds. Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.

basic.name: Inspire (W)
basic.description: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain 30% Attack Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.

basic.name: Adrenaline Rush (E)
basic.description: Heal Raynor for 25% of his maximum Health over 1 second. Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by 0.5 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

basic.name: Drop Pod (?)
basic.description: Activate to respawn at the targeted position instead of the halls of the storm dealing 200 damage on contact.

heroic.name: Hyperion (R)
heroic.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 damage.

heroic.name: Raynor's Raider (R)
heroic.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 damage per second and regenerates 75 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee. The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

trait.name: Give 'Em Some Pepper (T)
trait.description: Every 4th Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals 125% more damage to the main target.

1.name: Exterminator
1.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 125% while Inspire is active. Passive: Inspire does not expire on friendly Minions and Mercenaries.

1.name: Veteran Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%. Gambit: Gain 60% bonus Give 'Em Some Pepper damage. Every death reduces this bonus by 15%.

1.name: Ace In The Hole
1.description: {highlight}Quest: Hitting Penetrating Round increases the slow by 5% up to 5 times. When at max stacks, increase Raynor's damage by 15%. Stacks are lost on miss. Increase Penetrating Round's slow duration by 2 seconds.{/highlight}

4.name: Fight or Flight
4.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Raynor raiders
4.description: {highlight}Deploy a terran pod that deals 200 damage on contact with 3 marines and 1 medic that will go towards the closest lane to push.{/highlight}

4.name: Behemoth Armor
4.description: {highlight}Give 'Em Some Pepper heals 2% maximum health, doubled when the primary target is a Hero. Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 40 Health. After reaching 400 Health, each stack will now give 8 maximum Health instead. Loses the bonus Health on death.{/highlight}

7.name: Old Times
7.description: {highlight}Raynor always rides his Vulture. The first shot after dismounting deals 50% extra damage, and slows the target by 40% for 2 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Fuel The Rush
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 45. While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 300%.

7.name: Unstable Compound
7.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%. Each enemy Hero hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper grants Raynor 10 Mana and reduces the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 damage.

10.name: Raynor's Raider
10.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 damage per second and regenerates 75 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee. The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

13.name: Line 'Em Up
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. Penetrating Round hitting two or more enemy Heroes reduces its cooldown by an additional 3 seconds.

13.name: Giddy-Up
13.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 10% more Movement Speed.

13.name: Give Me More!
13.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Paint Them Red
16.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage Penetrating Round deals to Heroes.

16.name: Rallying Cry
16.description: Increase the Attack Speed bonus of Inspire by 20%. Passive: After every 12 Basic Attacks, cast Inspire for free.

16.name: We all got our choices to make
16.description: {highlight}Activate to make a pistol shoot on a straight line dealing 250 damage to the first enemy hero that it hits and preventing it from using any dash or similar for the next 4 seconds.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}If Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a hero it receives additional 3% of their maximum health as damage.{/highlight}

20.name: Cavalry's Arrived
20.description: {highlight}Activate for Hyperion to fire the Yamato Cannon at the target location dealing 450 damage after 1.25 seconds.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Raynor drop pod respawn inspire nearby units{/highlight}

20.name: Dusk Wing
20.description: Increase the Health and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. Its Basic Attack lowers enemy Hero Armor by 3 for 1 second, stacking up to 30.

20.name: Raiders Roll
20.description: Adrenaline Rush grants Unstoppable and continues healing for an additional 2 seconds. The additional duration ends upon reaching 70% Health.

20.name: Sergeant Pepper
20.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper now activates every 3 Basic Attacks.
